TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindingNavigator extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class BindingNavigator Inherits ToolStrip Implements ISupportInitialize
type BindingNavigator = class inherit ToolStrip interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: Represents the navigation and manipulation user interface (UI) for controls on a form that are bound to data.

span.span: Represents the navigation and manipulation user interface (UI) for controls on a form that are bound to data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項代表標準化的方式，來巡覽和管理在表單上的資料。The control represents a standardized way to navigate and manipulate data on a form. 在大部分情況下，配對控制項在表單上移動資料記錄，以及與它們互動。In most cases, a is paired with a control to move through data records on a form and interact with them. 在這些情況下，屬性設定至相關聯做為資料來源的元件。In these cases, the property is set to the associated component that acts as a data source. 根據預設，控制項的使用者介面 (UI) 組成的一系列按鈕、 文字方塊和最常見資料相關的動作，例如將資料加入、 刪除資料，並瀏覽資料的靜態文字項目。By default, the control's user interface (UI) is composed of a series of buttons, text boxes, and static text elements for most common data-related actions, such as adding data, deleting data, and navigating through data. 這些控制項可以擷取或設定透過相關聯之成員的控制項。Each of these controls can be retrieved or set through an associated member of the control. 同樣地，另外還有成員內的一對一對應類別，以程式設計方式執行相同的功能下, 表所示。Likewise, there is also a one-to-one correspondence to members within the class that programmatically perform the same functionality, as shown in the following table. |UI 控制項UI Control| 成員 member| 成員 member| |----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |**第一次移動****Move First**||| |**移到上一個****Move Previous**||| |**目前的位置****Current Position**||| |**計數****Count**||| |**移到下一個****Move Next**||| |**上次移動****Move Last**||| |**加入新****Add New**||| |**刪除****Delete**||| 加入控制項加入表單，並將它繫結至資料來源，例如，將會自動建立此資料表中的關聯性。Adding a control to a form and binding it to a data source, such as a , will automatically establish the relationships in this table. 您可以使用下列技術的其中一個來自訂此工具列：You can use one of the following techniques to customize this toolbar: - 建立與建構函式，可接受布林值`addStandardItems`參數，並將此參數設定為`false`。Create the with the constructor, which accepts a Boolean `addStandardItems` parameter, and set this parameter to `false`. 然後將新增所需物件加入至集合。Then add the desired objects to the collection. - 如果想要大量自訂，或可重複使用自訂的設計，衍生自並覆寫方法，以定義其他或其他標準的項目。If a great deal of customization is desired, or the custom design will be reused, derive a class from and override the method to define additional or alternate standard items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項移動資料集。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to move through a data set. 這個集合會包含在使用 元件繫結至 控制項的 中。The set is contained in a , which is bound to a control with a component. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式為了方便起見，結合的步驟，建立新的提供控制項並將它加入至父代。This constructor is provided as a convenience, combining the steps of creating a new control and adding it to a parent . 預設建構函式，例如設定屬性`null`並不會顯示標準使用者介面。Like the default constructor, it sets the property to `null` and does not show the standard user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會使用`BindingSource`參數來初始化屬性。This constructor uses the `BindingSource` parameter to initialize the property. 它也加入瀏覽按鈕的標準集並設定其對應的屬性，例如和。It also adds the standard set of navigational buttons and sets their corresponding properties, such as and .

summary.span: Gets or sets the that represents the **Add New** button.

value.span: A表示 * * 新增新 * * 按鈕。

span.span: A that represents the **Add New** button for the .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定時，屬性會產生事件處理常式**加入新** 按鈕。When set, the property generates the event handler for the **Add New** button. 此事件處理常式會呼叫方法時**加入新**按鈕在執行階段。This event handler calls the method when the **Add New** button is clicked at run time. 這個屬性是`null`如果先前未設定，並存取之前隱含或明確地呼叫方法。This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the method is implicitly or explicitly called. 控制項將會停用**加入新**按鈕如果屬性是`null`或屬性是`false`。The control will disable the **Add New** button if the property is `null` or the property is `false`. 在預設實作中，這個屬性代表類型的控制項。In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type .

summary.span: Adds the standard set of navigation items to the control.

span.span: Adds the standard set of navigation items to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將一組標準的使用者介面物件加入至工具帶狀基本瀏覽作業，例如**最先移動**，**最後移動**，和**新增**。The method adds the standard set of user interface objects to the tool strip for basic navigation operations, such as **Move First**, **Move Last**, and **Add New**. 覆寫衍生類別，定義其他或替代工具帶狀項目中。Override in derived classes to define additional or alternative tool strip items. 若要確保最佳的設計階段支援，為您衍生的類別，請確定每個項目中有意義的值及其屬性。To ensure optimal design-time support for your derived class, make sure each item has a meaningful value in its property. 在設計階段，這會用來產生對應的成員變數的唯一名稱。At design time, this will be used to generate a unique name for the corresponding member variable. 項目的屬性就會更新以符合提供給成員變數的名稱。The item's property will then be updated to match the name given to the member variable. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法不會明確地移除任何先前已存在的項目從，但未設定的新值， ， ， ， ， ，和屬性。This method does not explicitly remove any previously existing items from the , but does set new values for the , , , , , , and properties. 也新增項目時，不會暫停版面配置。Also does not suspend layout while items are being added.

summary.span: Disables updates to the controls of the during the component's initialization.

span.span: Disables updates to the controls of the during the component's initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法，可讓最佳化變更多個內容控制項。The and methods allow the control to optimize changes to multiple properties. 使用這一組方法，您可以初始化共同相依的屬性，或批次設定多個屬性在設計階段。Using this pair of methods, you can initialize co-dependent properties or batch set multiple properties at design time. 呼叫方法來通知控制項在啟動初始設定，則為呼叫方法來通知初始設定已完成。Call the method to signal the control that initialization is starting; call the method to signal that initialization is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性代表資料來源的巡覽。The property represents the data source that the navigates through. 更具體來說，屬性代表實際的資料清單。More specifically, the property of the represents the actual data list. 這是預設屬性類別。This is the default property for the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項移動資料集。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to move through a data set. 這個集合會包含在使用 元件繫結至 控制項的 中。The set is contained in a , which is bound to a control with a component. 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 將移到資料集使用 Windows Form BindingNavigator 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/move-through-a-dataset-with-wf-bindingnavigator-control.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Move Through a DataSet with the Windows Forms BindingNavigator Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/move-through-a-dataset-with-wf-bindingnavigator-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定時，此屬性會產生事件處理常式**刪除** 按鈕。When set, this property generates the event handler for the **Delete** button. 此事件處理常式會呼叫方法時**刪除**按鈕在執行階段。This event handler calls the method when the **Delete** button is clicked at run time. 這個屬性是`null`如果先前未設定，並存取之前隱含或明確地呼叫方法。This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the method is implicitly or explicitly called. 控制項將會停用**刪除**下列執行階段的情況下的按鈕：屬性是`null`、屬性為 0，或屬性`false`.The control will disable the **Delete** button under the following run-time circumstances: the property is `null`, the property is 0, or the property is `false`. 在預設實作中，這個屬性代表類型的控制項。In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type .

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [清理 Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 上和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: Raises the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了引發對應的事件，方法會執行下列作業相關聯的狀態對。In addition to raising the corresponding event, the method performs the following operations against the state of the associated . - 設定使用目前的內部成員狀態。Sets the internal members using the current state. - 啟用或停用適用於目前的使用者介面 (UI) 項目狀態。Enables or disables user interface (UI) items appropriately for the current state. - 更新和控制項。Updates the and controls. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ToolStripItem ^ PositionItem { System::Windows::Forms::ToolStripItem ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ToolStripItem ^ value); };
member this.PositionItem : System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the that displays the current position within the .

span.span: Gets or sets the that displays the current position within the .
The that displays the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在預設實作中，屬性屬於型別。In the default implementation, the property is of type . 這個屬性是`null`如果先前未設定，並存取之前隱含或明確地呼叫方法。This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the method is implicitly or explicitly called. 目前的位置計算方式是取得屬性，並加入要轉換成 1 為基底計數位置 1。The current position calculated by obtaining the property of the , and adding 1 to transform the position into a 1-based count. 在預設實作中，這個屬性代表類型的控制項。In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RefreshItems As EventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the state of the navigational user interface (UI) needs to be refreshed to reflect the current state of the underlying data.

span.span: Occurs when the state of the navigational user interface (UI) needs to be refreshed to reflect the current state of the underlying data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件的訊號的導覽 UI必須更新以反映目前的狀態相關聯的。The event signals that the navigational UI of the needs to be updated to reflect the current state of the associated . 這是預設事件類別。This is the default event for the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`BindingNavigator1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `BindingNavigator1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#124](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#124)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#124](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#124)]

summary.span: Refreshes the state of the standard items to reflect the current state of the data.

span.span: Refreshes the state of the standard items to reflect the current state of the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您已覆寫在衍生類別中，您也應該覆寫重新整理您加入至任何自訂標準項目的控制項。If you have overridden in a derived class, you should also override to refresh any custom standard items you have added to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來確認焦點轉換在執行按一下動作的項目之前控制項。Use this method to confirm focus can shift before performing the click action for an item on the control.
